definitions.definition: A part of any of several scientific or measuring instruments that moves back and forth to indicate a position .
A moving icon or other representation, usually called a pointer , of the position of the pointing device .
An indicator , often a blinking line or bar, indicating where the next insertion or other edit will take place.
A reference to a row of data in a table , which moves from row to row as data is retrieved by way of it.
A design pattern in object oriented methodology in which a collection is iterated uniformly.

main_definition: A part of any of several scientific or measuring instruments that moves back and forth to indicate a position .
secondary_definitions: ( graphical user interface ) A moving icon or other representation, usually called a pointer , of the position of the pointing device .
( computing ) An indicator , often a blinking line or bar, indicating where the next insertion or other edit will take place.
( databases ) A reference to a row of data in a table , which moves from row to row as data is retrieved by way of it.
( programming ) A design pattern in object oriented methodology in which a collection is iterated uniformly.
